lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

answers: Seven fat cows were swallowed by seven skinny cows
Seven cows danced in a field
Seven healthy heads of grain were swallowed by seven skinny ones
Seven baskets of grain flew away
Seven stalks of grain ate seven fat cows

questions.text: How did Pharaoh feel about these two dreams? Why?
answers: Worried because he couldn't understand their meaning
Terrified because he was afraid of cows

questions.text: What happened when Pharaoh told his wise men to explain his dream?
answers: They made up a fake meaning

questions.text: What did the wine taster say?
answers: When I was in prison, a man explained my dream to me
I had a dream last night too

questions.text: When Pharaoh said, "I heard you can explain dreams," what did Joseph say?
answers: God will tell me the answer
I am the best dream interpreter
I don't know anything about dreams

questions.text: What did the seven fat cows and seven fat heads of grain represent?
What did the seven skinny cows and seven skinny heads of grain represent?
What advice did Joseph give to Pharaoh?
answers: Put a man in charge of saving food during the first seven years
Ignore the dreams; nothing will happen
Build a giant wall around Egypt

questions.text: What job did Pharaoh give to Joseph?
answers: Second-in-command of his kingdom; his job was to store food
He made him captain of the guard
He sent him back to prison
